31K likes, 174 comments - doobydobap on September 1, 2025: "but im just a little feetus

ingredients
* 2 kg pig trotters, cut into chunks
* 200 ml light soy sauce
* 100 ml dark soy sauce (for that rich color)
* 200 g rock sugar (or substitute with 150 g brown sugar)
* 1 tbsp salt
* 2 tbsp rice wine or mirin
* 1 tbsp whole black peppercorns
* 3â€“4 star anise
* 2 bay leaves
* 1 stick chinese cinnamon (cassia bark)
* 10 cloves garlic, smashed
* 1 onion, quartered
* 1 thumb ginger, sliced
* 2 scallions, cut into big pieces
* water, enough to cover
instructions
1. first, parboil the trotters. drop them into boiling water for about 5 minutes to get rid of impurities. drain, rinse, and set aside.
2. in a big pot, add your soy sauces, rock sugar, spices, garlic, onion, ginger, and scallions. fill with enough water to cover everything. bring it to a boil.
3. add the trotters back in. lower the heat, and let it simmer gently for 2â€“2.5 hrs.
4. once done, fish out the trotters. slice them thin, pile onto a plate.".
